title: A problem with LoL client.
body:
Hello everyone, 
I have this problem that whenever I try to start the client, the league icon shows up and quickly disappears. I have waited for about good 30 minutes, and the client did not start. I also have PBE installed, and the same thing happens. 
Things I have tried: reinstall the game, update video drivers and DirectX. 

Any help is greatly appreciated.

replies.body: It seems that the patcher is trying to launch, but needs permission to do so.  Check out oru [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS settings are allowing the client to open.  That should get you fixed up!
